trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse"></xref> class is generated by the server when a severe error occurs.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse.Controls"></xref> property is not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
Not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
This property is not valid for a DSML error response.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse.Detail"></xref> property contains the contents of the <detail> element of the errorResponse, if any.
The contents of the <detail> element of the errorResponse, if any.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse.ErrorMessage"></xref> property is not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
This property is not valid for a DSML error response.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse.MatchedDN"></xref> property is not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
Not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
This property is not valid for a DSML error response.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse.Message"></xref> property contains the text returned in the <message> element of the errorResponse, if any.
The text returned in the <message> element of the errorResponse, if any.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse.Referral"></xref> property is not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
Not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
This property is not valid for a DSML error response.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse.ResultCode"></xref> property is not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
Not applicable to a DSML <errorResponse>.
This property is not valid for a DSML error response.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse.Type"></xref> property contains a value of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory"></xref> that specifies the type of the error response returned by the server.
This property corresponds to the "type" attribute of the \<errorResponse> element.
A value of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory"></xref> that specifies the type of the error response returned by the server.
